reviewText:
This DVD is Not for KIDS

This DVD is NOT for Children

This DVD is for whom? Re-cycle bin

Poor Audio

Poor Teaching Technique ( He keeps on Talking something with his LOUSY voice)

SAVE YOUR MONEY - Stay away from this Product.
